SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcUserRepository
public interface UserRepository
Repository interface for user data access operations. Defines methods for performing CRUD operations and specific queries related to users.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • findByUsername

      Optional<UserModel> findByUsername(String username)
      Find a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the user if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • findById

      Optional<UserModel> findById(Long id)
      Find a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the user if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • findAll

      List<UserModel> findAll()
      Retrieve all users.
      Returns:
      List of all users

    • save

      UserModel save(UserModel user)
      Save a user to the database. If the user has no ID, they will be inserted as a new record. If they have an ID, the existing record will be updated.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to save
      Returns:
      The saved user with generated ID (for new records)

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(Long id)
      Delete a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to delete

    • existsByUsername

      boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Check if a user exists with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check
      Returns:
      true if a user exists with the username, false otherwise

    • updateLastLogin

      void updateLastLogin(Long userId, LocalDateTime lastLogin)
      Update the last login timestamp for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update
      lastLogin - The new last login timestamp
